text: læa cng khearph sakkara xallxhˌ theid læa xya hı mi sing hnung sing dı pen phakhi kab phraxngkh læa cng tha di tx phu bangkeid kela thang sxng læa tx phu pen yati thi kıl chid læa dek kaphra læa phu khadsn læa pheuxnban kıl kheiyng læa pheuxn thi hang kil læa pheuxn kheiyng khang læa phu deinthang læa phu thi muxkhwa khxng phwk cea khrxbkhrxng thæ cring xallxhˌ mi thrng chxb phu yaso phu xoxwd
